contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=257 |maint= |map=Route 257-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= | length_km = 85 |length_round =1 |direction_a=South |direction_b=North |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page (?), Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |terminus_a={{jct|state=NH|US|3}} near [[Pittsburg, New Hampshire|Pittsburg, NH]] |terminus_b={{jct|state=QC|QC|216}} in [[Saint-Adrien, Quebec|Saint-Adrien]] |junction={{jct|state=QC|QC|112}} at [[Weedon, Quebec|Weedon]]<br/> {{jct|state=QC|QC|108}} at [[Gould, Quebec|Gould]] |cities= Weedon, Scotstown |previous_type=QC |previous_route=255 |next_type=QC |next_route=259 }} '''Route 257''' is a north-south highway on the south shore of the [[St. Lawrence River]], in the [[Eastern Townships]] region of [[Quebec]]. Its northern terminus is in [[Saint-Adrien, Quebec|Saint-Adrien]] at a junction with [[Quebec Route 216|Route 216]] and its southern terminus is at the [[New Hampshire]] border, where it becomes [[U.S. Route 3|US 3]]. ==Towns along Route 257== * [[Saint-Adrien, Quebec|Saint-Adrien]] * [[Ham-Sud]] * [[Weedon, Quebec|Weedon]] * [[Lingwick, Quebec|Lingwick]] * [[Scotstown, Quebec|Scotstown]] * [[La Patrie, Quebec|La Patrie]] * [[Chartierville, Quebec|Chartierville]] ==See also== * [[List of Quebec provincial highways]] ==References== <references/> == External links == * [http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&saddr=St-Adrien,+Asbestos,+Quebec,+Canada&daddr=RTE-257%2FRTE-257+E+%4045.740681,+-71.517576+to:RTE-257+%4045.553379,+-71.333744+to:45.253863,-71.206169&hl=en&geocode=13421166620185501398,45.740681,-71.517576%3B11407372041288357315,45.553379,-71.333744&mra=dme&mrcr=0&mrsp=3&sz=12&via=1,2&sll=45.27537,-71.187973&sspn=0.111134,0.30899&ie=UTF8&ll=45.560218,-71.435852&spn=0.884601,2.471924&z=9 Route 257] on Google Maps * [http://www.inforoutiere.qc.ca/fr/carte_routiere/index.asp Provincial Route Map (Courtesy of the Quebec Ministry of Transportation)] {{fr icon}} {{Secondary Highways in Quebec (200-series)}} [[Category:Quebec Routes|257]] {{Quebec-road-stub}}
